name: DiRT 3 Complete Edition
description: Like its predecessors, the Dirt 3: Complete Edition racing game comes back with another tire-ripping, mud-splashing, and challenging racing sequel. Packed with a number of compelling locations from the lakes of Michigan, the forests of Finland to the hair-bending slopes of Aspen, this Sony Playstation 3 video game gives you a thrilling experience. Featuring over 100-plus circuits, point-to-point rallies, checkpoint races, and gymkhana events, this Sony Playstation 3 video game has a number of challenges to keep your seat belt fastened. Incorporating advanced and highly accurate gameplay mechanics including braking assists, drifts, spins, slides, and jumps, this racing game gives you an adrenalin-pumping gameplay throughout. From trucks, buggies to other beefy automobiles, the Dirt 3: Complete Edition has a number of vehicles to help you choose the best ride. Moreover, being a special edition, this Sony Playstation 3 video game comes bundled with 13 new cars and over 50 liveries.
